General.Name: Gansu Engineering Consulting Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Gansu Engineering Consulting Group Co., Ltd. provides engineering consulting services. It offers planning consultation, architectural survey and design, water conservancy and hydropower survey and design, engineering supervision, bidding agency, and engineering inspection services. The company was formerly known as Lanzhou Sanmao Industrial Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Gansu Engineering Consulting Group Co., Ltd. in July 2019. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Lanzhou, China.
